column5: I don't remember any in Vaughan, but then again haven't been there in three years.  Pretty neat though.  If your ever in Calgary check it out.  http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/s...&storeID=75
I believe the Archery range is the only ACTUAL range ! The shooting range is just a game for kids they have !  I think the BPs in michigan has the same thing
